title: Business Developement
tagsAndSkills: Capital Market,Debt capital,B2B,Sales,Business Development,Business Acquisition,Field,Cxo
jobDescription:
Business Development


Role & responsibilities

Responsible for the origination of Rating Business for the mid/Large Corporate Group in the given region. • Responsible for maintaining and enhancing strong relationship with existing and new client acquisition. • Effectively maintaining relationships with clients, effectively handling client challenges for customized assignments • Identify unrated clients and facilitate them in migrating from unrated domain to rated domain and help them leverage rating for fund raising. • Increases operational efficiency, Sales MIS, CRM updation. • Completion of commitments in due time frame, Situation handling- like unavailability of information from clients, bankers, etc • Reaching target achievement: based on no. of mandates & no. of cases executed.



Interested candidates shared cv on snehal@topgearconsultants.com
clientHeadline: Corporate in B2B Financial Services Sector
